member.name: M:CosmosStack.Text.Splitters.Splitter.On(System.Char,System.Char[])
member.summary:
On. Set a symbol, execute split when the symbol is hit, and return a new Splitter instance.
On 操作，设置一个符号，当命中该符号时执行切割，并返回一个 Splitter 实例。

member.name: M:CosmosStack.Text.Splitters.Splitter.On(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary:

member.summary:
